data.text:
Thrill Team Building Activities and Events Experts

Thrill creates and facilitates exciting, quality, interactive sustainable team building activities, group experiences and team bonding events. Motivating, Engaging, inspiring and connecting your staff and teams. Quality staff training, team culture, staff development and leadership programs facilitated. For businesses, corporates and organisations to achieve greater success together. Throughout Australia; Staff in Sydney, Hunter Valley, the Gold Coast and Brisbane.

20+ years experience. Professionally Facilitated Team Building Activities. 100% Staff Engagement, Staff Training, Culture & Leadership Development for Corporate Team Events in Sydney and beyond The Gold Coast!

In case you need to get buy-in for a team building questions event, here is a recap of all the benefits of and purposes for using questions with teams: Why use team building? Breaking the ice Fostering communication Encouraging âdisconnect to connectâ Learning each otherâs values Increasing trust in the boss and each other Increasing participation, even that of shy people Relieving stress Generating laughter, happy feelings Promoting healthy competition Getting to know one another Revealing more about the personal side of people Strengthening bonds Discovering what drives other people

Top 500 Corporate Clients Share Their Experience with Thrill

I just wanted to say thank you for a wonderful CSI event last week. Michelle, you ran a great day which was enjoyed by all and got everyone working well as a team, with a lot of laughs along the way. Thank you, Michelle it was just what we needed. Thank you!

Debra

From Sydney

Terrific Amazing Race in Sydney. Exciting, fun and definitely integrated our team cohesively.

From Sydney

Hi Michelle & Konrad of Thrill team building activities and corporate events. We are writing to say a huge THANK YOU for a great day yesterday ð The feedback I have received from all staff attending Thrill Cooking for Causes has been very positive. Everyone not only enjoyed themselves! But also felt good that we were able to provide some help of wholesome hot meals to those in our Hunter community who arenât quite as fortunate as the rest of us. Thanks to the two of you and the rest of your lovely team yesterday, everyone, even those in our group who arenât always so willing to mingle and participate at these kind of events, has given positive feedback ð You ran a great team event from start to finish and helped bring our staff together. Thank You.

Hello Konrad and Michelle, I hope you are both well. I wanted to say a huge thank you for the treasure hunt team building activities you facilitated for BSI staff last week. Everyone had a great time. Bringing the team together through a fun friendly, clever yet competitive activity. ð At the dinner there was a great response to the edited video package, highlighting the team work, collaboration and sharing - so we appreciate your time to collate this for BSI too. Can't wait til the next Thrill-ing team building event.

On behalf of our entire Global Power Energy team, I would like to extend our heartfelt gratitude for your invaluable support during our July 2024 Corporate Event. The success we achieved would not have been possible without Thrill staff’s exceptional services and dedication.

Thrill team events pl professionalism and commitment have left a profound impression on us! We are thoroughly impressed by the quality and reliability you brought to GPG event. Your expertise and attention to detail played a significant role in making our event a resounding success.

We deeply appreciate your partnership and look forward to collaborating with you on future projects. Your contributions have set a high standard! We are excited about the potential for continued successful collaborations.Â Once again, thank you for your outstanding support.Â

Ivy Guan Global Power Generation Australia plÂ Office administrative officer
